descriptionHtml:
==WARNING==
By Downloading This Is Will Replace All Giants In Skyrim With My Texture
There Is A Armour Mod I Am Currently Working On Right Now So If There 
Is Any Questions I Will Try To Answer Them As Quick As Possible
==ThanksGhostReconMC== ALSO You Find Hawkeye Next To Breeze Home 
On The Left If You Just Enter Whiterun ENJOY!!



==NOTE== THE LEGENDARY CLUB OF HAWKEYE Is Right Next To The Smelter On The Right As You Enter Whiterun 
It Is Extremely Powerful And You Will Almost Get A Kill Cam Every Time Next To The Legendary Club Of Hawkeye Is A Giants Club For Your Follower To Have ALSO My Youtube Account Is Called GhostReconMC Thank You!!
author: GhostReconMC
